messages.title: BRING BACK SIMON
messages.content: Simon served as our MP for 32 years. He worked tirelessly for local people and fought for liberal values.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Simon will fight for genuinely affordable housing.
He will fight for local jobs and services.
He will fight for people to have the final say on the final Brexit deal negotiated by the Government.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Two years ago, many people in Bermondsey and Old Southwark were saddened to see a Labour MP elected.

issues.brexitEurope: He will fight for people to have the final say on the final Brexit deal negotiated by the Government.
issues.health: He led the campaign to save Guy's Hospital.

housing.content: Simon will fight for genuinely affordable housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: Simon served as our MP for 32 years. He worked tirelessly for local people and fought for liberal values.

politicalExperience.role: MP for Bermondsey and Old Southwark
politicalExperience.achievements: Led the campaign to save Guy's Hospital. Won the fight for Bermondsey and Southwark stations on the Jubilee Line. Helped thousands of individual residents, housing associations, and businesses with their battles.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet is promoted and printed by Robert Hayward on behalf of Simon Hughes both at 210 Southwark Park Road, SE16 3RW.
